front.title: Portable Fusion Generator
front.gametext: Deploy on any warrior. When that warrior fires a blaster rifle or artillery weapon, adds 1 to each of that weapon's destiny draws. Also, may add 1 to power of one droid present.
front.lore: Lardanis Survival Systems MFCR-200 Power Generator. Used by smugglers and Rebel agents. Highly portable. Powers and charges a wide range of equipment.
